question: What is the vacation policy?
answer: Full-time employees receive 15 days of paid vacation per year, vacation days accrue monthly at 1.25 days per month, and unused vacation can roll over up to 5 days. (Source: Employee Handbook)

question: Can I work remotely?
answer: Yes, employees may work remotely up to 2 days per week according to the employee handbook. Full remote work requires director approval.

question: What are the work hours?
answer: The standard work hours are 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday through Friday. (Source: Employee Handbook)
